code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph INFRA
      Redis --> Vault
      Vault --> PostgreSQL
      PostgreSQL --> Liquibase
      PostgreSQL --> Prometheus
      Redis --> Prometheus
      Prometheus --> Grafana
      Pulsar --> Prometheus
      Pulsar --> PulsarManager
    end

    subgraph SERVICES
      Auth -->|Event| EventProcessor
      Leave --> EventProcessor
      Employee --> EventProcessor
      Notifications --> EventProcessor
    end

    subgraph FRONTEND
      HRWeb --> API
      HRMobile --> API
    end

    API(Traefik Gateway) --> Auth
    API --> Leave
    API --> Employee
    API --> Notifications
